name: Slime Retrieve 1.2
description:
Slime Retrieve  UPDATE 1.2 Changelog

New Areas!!!

-Added Shed

-Added City

-Added Sewer

-Added Shop

Personality!!!

-Every slime is now unique with their own dialogue when picked up

New NPCS!!!

-Added Juggler

-Added Cashier

New Animations!!!

-Every slime has a unique animation to help create a variety in slimes

New Music!!!

- Created “GET THOSE SLIMES” 

- Created “Smelly Sewer”
